articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav didn't score a single run in the ODIs against Australia, having incurred three golden ducks.
articles.content: The No. T20 batter in the world, Suryakumar Yadav, hasn't found the key to success in ODI cricket yet. He incurred three golden ducks in the 50-over assignment against Australia, triggering a plethor… [+1963 chars]

articles.title: Issy Wong helps Mumbai Indians into WPL final with historic first hat-trick - The Guardian
